sentence: Thank God you’re here! I just signed the Doha agreement and they made me the new governor of Darfur.
I really don’t know what the heck I’m supposed to do! Help me out!

2.reply: You signed an agreement with Bashir?? pfft, you’re on your own, pal!

sentence: I’ve been commissioned to help stop migration from Darfur, but I don’t have the slightest idea where to start!
There are an estimated 2 million people displaced in Darfur alone!
Can you help me with budget allocation?

I have a tiny budget, but also some of that sweet EU money. But I have hungry people in IDPs, clashes between tribes, out of control police, and the list goes on! How should I spend this budget? What’s the priority?
1. Relief and aid for the camps
2. Increase law enforcement budget to control migration
3. Rehabilitation project for a few villages (conflict resolution & small scale development)
The aid ran out and these people are on my ass!! Start a kickstarter campaign! Call your rich auntie! do something!
Nice work, Einstein! Now I have militias and paramilitary forces with an expensive taste and an iron fist! If they overthrow me I’m moving into YOUR house!

I knew there was something special about you! The rehab project worked wonderfully! (I even scraped a little off the top) But I got the people in the villages on my side and they’re even accepting IDPs from the camps! How would you like a position in my cabinet??
